mapper.update: update analysis set balance = nvl((select sum(inamount) from income where id =#{id} and substr(indate,1,5) = (select substr(sysdate,1,5) from dual)),0) - nvl((select sum(examount) from expense where id = #{id} and substr(exdate,1,5) = (select substr(sysdate,1,5) from dual)),0) where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select balance from analysis where id=#{id}
